        protected abstract Value tryToProvide​(Key key,
                                      KeyValueProvider<Key,​Value> requestee)
        Provide the appropriate value for the key.
        Returns:
        the value of null if none could be provided

      • provideLocally

        public Value provideLocally​(Key key)
        Provide the value associated to the given key from this very instance, i.e., do not relay the request to parent instances on misses.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the value or null if this very instance does not associate a value with the key

      • processParentEntry

        protected void processParentEntry​(Key key,
                                  Value value)
        React to a value that has been delivered by a parent. Does nothing be default.
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the entry
        value - the value of the entry or null if no such value exists

      • setParent

        public void setParent​(KeyValueProvider<Key,​Value> parent)

      • withSlf4jWarning

        public KeyValueProvider<Key,​Value> withSlf4jWarning​(java.lang.String slf4jFormat)
        Log a warning in SLF4J format when using this instance to provide a value. The requested key will be passed as parameter.
        Returns:
        this instance
